plugins.name: Upbit Official
plugins.description: Upbit Official API — Real-time crypto trading
plugins.description_long: Official API plugin for Upbit, Korea's largest cryptocurrency exchange. Supports real-time price quotes, market/limit orders, portfolio tracking, and full symbol scanning. Fully compatible with the auto-trading engine. Built on the pyupbit library for stable and reliable integration.
how_it_works: Get your API Key from your Upbit account (Open API management page)
Enter your API Key and Secret Key in the Store
Verify the connection with Test Connection
Activate and start trading via chatbot or auto-trading engine
plugins.auth_note: API Keys are encrypted and stored using Windows Credential Manager. Never stored in plain text.

plugins.name: Alpaca Markets
plugins.description: Alpaca Markets — US Stock & Crypto Trading
plugins.description_long: Official plugin for Alpaca, a commission-free US stock and crypto trading platform. Supports 8 markets including S&P 500, NASDAQ, NYSE, and crypto. Test strategies safely with Paper Trading mode. Features WebSocket real-time quotes and fractional shares support.
how_it_works: Create an Alpaca account and get your API Key (Paper or Live)
Enter your API Key and Secret Key in the Store
Verify the connection with Test Connection
Select markets to scan in Strategy Editor and start auto-trading
plugins.auth_note: Paper Trading keys are provided by default for risk-free testing. Keys are encrypted and stored securely.

plugins.name: Mock Broker
plugins.description: Mock Broker for testing — No real money
plugins.description_long: A virtual broker for development and testing. Test your trading strategies with simulated data without connecting to a real exchange. Ready to use immediately with the built-in test keys (mock_api_key / mock_secret_key).
how_it_works: Enter the default test keys: mock_api_key / mock_secret_key
Activate and test with virtual symbols like MOCK-BTC, MOCK-ETH
Switch to a real broker once your strategy is ready
plugins.auth_note: Test-only. No real funds are used.

plugins.name: Kalshi
plugins.description: Kalshi prediction market — CFTC-regulated, browser automation
plugins.description_long: Kalshi prediction market exchange via CDP (Chrome browser automation). Browse markets, view orderbook, place limit/market orders. CFTC-regulated. No API key needed — just log in.
how_it_works: Launch Chrome with remote debugging enabled
Log in to your Kalshi account in the browser
Activate this plugin — it connects via CDP automatically
plugins.auth_note: No credentials stored. Your login session stays in your browser. SandClaw never sees your password.

plugins.name: Robinhood
plugins.description: Robinhood — Commission-free stock & crypto trading via browser
plugins.description_long: Commission-free stock, crypto, and prediction market trading via Chrome browser automation. SandClaw connects to your Robinhood session through CDP — no API keys needed, just log in to your account. Supports stocks, fractional shares, crypto, and event contracts.
how_it_works: Launch Chrome with remote debugging enabled
Log in to your Robinhood account in the browser
Activate this plugin — it connects via CDP automatically
plugins.auth_note: No credentials stored. Your login session stays in your browser. SandClaw never sees your password.

plugins.name: Web Search (DuckDuckGo)
plugins.description: DuckDuckGo-based real-time web search — No API key required
plugins.description_long: Real-time web search plugin powered by DuckDuckGo. No API key required — works instantly. Search for the latest news, market data, and company information through the chatbot. Uses the privacy-respecting DuckDuckGo search engine.
how_it_works: Activate with no additional setup required
Ask the chatbot to search — e.g., 'search for...', 'find latest news about...'
Search results are included directly in the chatbot response
plugins.auth_note: No API key required. Uses DuckDuckGo's public search API.
